Engine.​src.​graphicsEngine.​toolbox.​Geometry

A class containing methods for geometry purpose

Functions
AddPointToList
public static bool AddPointToList(
ref List<BoxPoint> points,
BoxPoint newPoint
)

Verifies the lists and only adds the point if no other has the same coordinates

See AddPointsToList(ref List{BoxPoint}, List{BoxPoint}) to add several points at once

Parameters
points
ref List<BoxPoint>

List to append, as a reference

newPoint
BoxPoint
Returns

True if the point was added, else false

Verifies the lists and only adds the points if no other has the same coordinates

See AddPointToList(ref List{BoxPoint}, BoxPoint) to add only 1 point

Parameters

List to append, as a reference

Orientation
public static int Orientation(
BoxPoint p,
BoxPoint q,
BoxPoint r
)

Determine the orientation of ordered triplet (p, q, r).

Returns

0 -> p, q and r are colinear, 1 -> Clockwise, 2 -> Counterclockwise
